title: Brutalized Van Baarle Vows to Rebound After Broken Hip Marks Third Serious Setback of Season
content:
'It’s been a long way coming back, here we are again': Most unfortunate rider of 2024 missed Roubaix and the Tour de France, and is out of the Vuelta a España just three race-days later.

Read the full article at Brutalized Van Baarle Vows to Rebound After Broken Hip Marks Third Serious Setback of Season on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
